name: ArtilleryCombinator
title: Artillery Combinator
author: Qon
description: A combinator that lets you target places on the map with your artillery via the circuit network. X and Y to set the relative position. It's the absolute position if signal A > 0. Send an 'Artillery Remote' signal to order your artillery to shoot. Bumped to 1.1 by Phoenix-D, just a info.json change.
